name: Westgrove
description:
Westgrove is a game that focuses as much as possible on emulating the ps1 era gaming experience with horror elements and follows a found footage story style with inspiration from some 90's movies.

STORY

You are an amateur videographer who does freelance work for TV programs, news channels, weddings, etc.

Today will be just another day at work in Westgrove.

So what are you waiting for, embark on this horrifying time travel with feelings of nostalgia and fear

PATREON

CLICK HERE

Besides helping an indie developer you increase the quality of my games and speed up the production time, and get exclusive benefits
